title: Human Xerath skin?

embed.description: I think I made him a bit too pretty/young >.> I'll prob work on this more later or attempt to redraw him again

body: This isnt my artwork, but i saw it and thought that would be a pretty cool skin for him, reasons being A)ITS NOT A FUCKING RECOLOR and B) Only thing they would have to do is give him his old lightning particles from his old kit. cmon rito, its been 2 years since his last skin. Show {{champion:101}} the love he deserves with the skin he needs.

replies.body: I guess kinda like Pre-Void Kassadin it'd be called Pre Ascension Xerath?

They can't. Due to the lore he is supposed to be sealed because his power rivaled the mages. Although he is powerful enough to crack the seal he can't break out of it. He decided to join the LoL because he is able to steal the power of the nexus which should be able to break the seal. Sadly at the end of each game he is still stuck in the seal. Just another gg with no sign of him getting any stronger or us seeing his true form (which is pure power/mana).
Skins and the default lore don't mix.
Then that would also mean that PROJECT: Yasuo shouldnt be here. But yet it is. Also if you read his ult flavor text, It says "Xerath ascends to his true form"
You do realise that, besides skins not having to fit lore, what you are talking about has been retconned anyways, do you?
